sourcesContent:
LVFX Production Management

A comprehensive tool for film and television production management, script breakdown, and shot organization.

Key Features

Everything you need for efficient production workflow

movie
Production Management

Track multiple productions and manage team access with role-based permissions.

description
Script Breakdown

Break down scripts into sequences, scenes, and action beats for better organization.

videocam
Shot Management

Create and organize shots with detailed metadata, storyboards, and status tracking.

Ready to streamline your production workflow?
